title: Footy fans post hilarious memes after the referees rob the Canberra Raiders in the NRL Grand Final
text:
Footy fans have poked fun at the NRL Grand Final referees in a string of hilarious memes after officiating blunders handed victory to the Sydney Roosters.

The Raiders went down to the Sydney Roosters 14-8 but the match was marred by questionable calls from Ben Cummins and Gerard Sutton, which swung momentum in the Roosters' favor at pivotal moments in the clash.

NRL fans took to Twitter to post amusing comments on the game, including GIFs of Forrest Gump and edited photos showing one of the referees celebrating with the Roosters.

The most controversial calls came deep in the second half when Roosters were given the ball back deep in Raiders territory when the referees initially waved six more tackles to Canberra before Cummins changed his mind.

Seconds later, Roosters full-back James Tedesco raced away to score what was the match-winning try.

It was one of several strange decisions that went against the Raiders in their first Grand Final appearance in 25 years.
